translations: 异教；偶像崇拜；异教教义

sentences.sentence: "I've understood from Shielders" (that was the curate, Sir) "that he lets her grow up in absolute heathenism."
sentences.translation: 我从希尔得斯那儿听说(先生，那就是副牧师)，他听任她在真正的异教中长大。

sentences.sentence: At first once performed to the heathenism temple or the spacious building to rebuild, simultaneously the mold in the style of antiquity Rome rectangle meeting hall form constructed the Christ church.
sentences.translation: 起初曾对异教神庙或宽敞的建筑物加以改建，同时模仿古罗马长方形大会堂形式建造基督教堂。
